identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a voice-first, culturally grounded, and accessible platform for Af Maay speakers.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Somali oral tradition warmth with Swiss functional precision.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel welcoming and empowering, not clinical.
Content is King: The voice is the content. Visuals support, never distract.
Zoom In: Focus on the 'Tap to Talk' moment. It is the heartbeat of the app.
Negative Space: Essential for low-literacy users to reduce cognitive load.

usage_rules: Primary color (#E07A5F) is ONLY for the main 'Talk' action and primary CTAs.
Use High Contrast borders (2px) for all interactive elements to aid visibility.

rules: Headings must be bold and earthy.
Body text must be high-contrast for readability.
Touch targets must be at least 48px x 48px.
Spacing between sections should be at least 80px (py-20).

visual_enhancers.borders: Rounded-xl or Rounded-2xl. 2px solid border for better definition.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows (shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)]) for a tactile feel.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay on backgrounds to reduce digital harshness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky navs. High blur (backdrop-blur-xl), distinct border.

types: Pulse animation for the 'Talk' button (essential for affordance).

voice_button.description: The central interaction point. A massive, circular or pill-shaped button.
voice_button.style: h-32 w-32 md:h-48 md:w-48 rounded-full bg-primary text-white shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-transform

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground border-2 border-border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

inputs.style: h-14 bg-background border-2 border-input rounded-lg px-4 text-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary

layouts.marketing: Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid. Large hero image, offset text. Use texture.
layouts.app: Voice-first layout. Bottom-heavy controls (thumb zone). Minimal top nav.
layouts.dashboard: Clean, high-contrast grid. 'Control Room' style but with softer edges.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Organic & Earthy' theme immediately in tailwind.config.js.
Install 'Epilogue' and 'Manrope' fonts via Google Fonts.
Create a custom 'VoiceInput' component that dominates the screen when active.
Ensure all text has high contrast ratios (AA standard).
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and authentication screens.
Do not use generic gradients. Use the solid colors defined in the palette.
For the 'Tap to Talk' button, ensure it occupies at least 30-40% of the mobile viewport height in the main interaction mode.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
